subject: Re: [junit] Testing EJBs
msgSnippet: ... I know you have plans to simulate the container for CMP, but I would find it too much effort to do, myself. I would sooner get other things working first.
messageBody:
Alexander Ananiev wrote:

> There is no reason why CMP entity beans can't run outside of the
> container.

I know you have plans to simulate the container for CMP, but I would
find it too much effort to do, myself. I would sooner get other things
working first.

Since CMP entity beans are designed to be coupled to a database, I see
little point in trying to work around that coupling, as you say.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
